title: Top dark humour!!!
review: Finally a fight with the juggernaut vs colossus, 2 heavy hitters go toe to toe!! the humour is top notch the comedy is quality its not predictable i thoroughly enjoyed it! Hoping for a 3rd, brill film

title: Almost perfection, but everythin has flaws
review: This film was a marvel masterpiece, and had it not hav had the flaws im gona mention it wud hav got 10/10, but what they did with hulk and thor gutted me, hulk, since avengers 1 has had a weakend state, in each and every film, weaker and weaker, i gave them infinity war because i was expecting a big thanos finalÃ¨ with hulk, but saying i was let down is an understatement!!! He was there biggest trump card!!!! And theyve totally taken all the aggression out of him, stupid!!! Really stupid!!! Then thor was made to look a gimmick, even wen he was worthy with both axes he was still fat, stupid. Then the lineup with the women superheros was totally ridiculous!!! Then theres captain marvel, who didnt even get a messed up hair doo by thanos never mind a whopping!! So who cares who captain marvel fights in capt marvel 2??? Cus if the powerfullest villian in the universe cant beat her then who cares!!! U can tell which way marvel are going in the future. These flaws was totally ridiculous to me, if these errors had of been rectified i wud hav given it 10/10 but if 8.5/10 was a fair score to me,

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
title: Utter trash
review:
Is leia indestructable????
Are all the captains female????
Why are all the men killed off????
And luke skywalker!?!? I thought it was all about luke??? Not just to kill him off also!!!! And rey absolutely annoys me to death!!!! Is she unstoppable?!?!? Iv never seen such trash!!! What a way to ruin one of the best franchaises ever!!! I am totally done with starwars!!!!the vader days are long long gone in a galaxy far far away!!!!
